provisions.title: Article 87 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. (sé) KAGAME Paul Perezida wa Repubulika President of the Republic Président de la République (sé) Dr NGIRENTE Edouard Minisitiri w’Intebe Prime Minister Premier Ministre kandi bishyizweho ikirango cya Repubulika: and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: Vu et scellé du Sceau de la République: (sé) Dr UGIRASHEBUJA Emmanuel w’Ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa Nkuru Minister of Justice and Attorney General Ministre de la Justice et Garde des Sceaux ANNEX I TO LAW N ° 064/2021 OF 14/10/2021 GOVERINING BIOGICAL DIVERSITY CRITICALLY ENDANGERED SPECIES FAUNA (ANIMALS) PHYLUM CHORDATA (CHORDATES) CLASS MAMMALIA (MAMMALS) Scientific Name Antilocapra americana (I) (only the population of Mexico; no other population is includedd in the Annexes to this Law Bos sauveli (I) Bubalus depressicornis (I) Bubalus mindorensis (I) Bubalus quarlesi (I) Capra farconeri (I) Capricornis milneedwardii (I) Capricornis rubidus (I) Capricornis sumatraensis (I) Capricornis thar (I) Cephalophus jentinki (I) Gazella cuvieri (I) Gazella leptoceros (I) Hippotragus niger variani (I) Naemorhedus baileyi (I) Naemorhedus caudatus (I) Naemorhedus goral (I) Naemorhedus gruseus (I) Nager dama (I) Oryx dammah (I) Oryx leucoryx (I) Ovis ammon hodgsonii (I) Ovis ammon nigrimontana (I) Ovis aries ophion (I) Ovis aries vignei (I) Pantolops hodgsonii (I) Pseudoryx nghetinhensis (I) Redunca arundinum (II) Tragelaphus spekei Vicugna vicugna (I) (except for the populations of: Argentina [the populations of the Provinces of Jujuy and Catamarca and the semi-captive population of the Provinces of Jujuy, Salta, Catamarca, La Rioja and San Juan]; Bolivia [the whole popuplation]; Chile [population of the Primera Regiόn]; Ecuador [the whole population] and Peru [the whole population]) Axis kuhlili (I) Axis kuhlili (I) Axis porcinus annamiticus (I) Blastocerus dichotomus (I) Cervus elaphus hangu (I) Dama dama mesopotamia (I) Hippocamelus ssp. Excludes the domesticated form and the dingo which referenced as Canis lupus familiaris and Canis lupus dingo, respectively, which are not subject to the provisions of this Law) Canis simensis Speothos venaticus (I) Panthera leo (II) (african populations) Acinonyx jubatus (I) (Annual export quotas for live specimens and hunting trophies are granted as follows: Botswana: 5; Namibia: 150; Zimbabwe: 50. République: (sé) Dr UGIRASHEBUJA Emmanuel w’Ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa Nkuru Minister of Justice and Attorney General Ministre de la Justice et Garde des Sceaux ANNEX II TO LAW N° 064/2021 OF 14/10/2021 GOVERNING BIOLOGICAL DIVERSITY ENDANGERED SPECIES FAUNA (ANIMALS) PHYLUM CHORDATA (CHORDATES) CLASS MAMMALIA (MAMMALS) Scientific Name Aepyceros melampus Budorcas taxicolor (II) Capra
